name: SPAN 5M
title: Medical Spanish
description: Students learn medical vocabulary, useful expressions, suitable grammatical structures, and cultural background to be able to interact with Spanish-speaking patients and doctors. Medical Spanish fulfills language requirement for Human Biology majors and Global Community Health B.A. and B.S. majors.

conditions.restricted_to_majors: human biology majors and global community health B.A. and B.S. majors.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): SPAN 4; or SPHS 4, or SPHS 5, or SPHS 6; or placement into SPAN 5 or SPHS 4 via the online Spanish Placement Examination. Enrollment is restricted to human biology majors and global community health B.A. and B.S. majors.
